title: self locking actuator friction versus worm gear
content: planning control bicycle derailleur with electronic circuit the advantages being multiple but not topic this question the actuation would performed placing the assembly very close the derailleur but not and winding the usual steel cable around spool placed axis gear and using motor turn the gear this question concerns the for the spool self locking mechanism and eventually the kind motor use the literature found and other similar ones that directly modify the derailleur with stepper motor and then are forced keep the stepper motor powered all the time keep some torque the shaft consider this therefore require self locking system able remove power come with two ideas worm gear operated motor where the steel cable wound around the gear this system self locking almost self locking according the gear ratio the gear cannot easily drive the worm motor driving normal gears with reduction factor but with additional friction element whose friction force greater than the strength the spring mounted the derailleur sorry mixed the technical terms this what normal bicycles already have the friction along the cable and the element placed the handle high and keeps the derailleur place both system would assisted position sensitive element trimmer detect the actual position the gear and the derailleur all configured closed feedback loop don consider additional options for the gear such this one that consists parallel axis gears whose teeth are however shaped manner achieve self locking without the need low efficiency worm system from point view cannot see any clear advantage worm gear friction except for the worm gear may allow build more compact assembly thanks the two axes being speed torque worm gears reduce the torque but the motor has spin lot and cannot wait seconds for each gear change concerning the choice the motor type this not the main question though think that worm gear allows easily use motor since torque are low and don need detect the position the shaft moreover motors increase torque with decreasing speed while stepper motors have the maximum torque defined the stepping frequency are more compact and cheaper important decide offer this assembly kit and not unique personal prototype working with supply and fear most easy get motors old printers scrap work with reduction the available torque when operated was looking for mechanics section stack exchange but couldn find opted for robotics instead

title: multiple control loops with effects
content: familiar with using pid perform closed loop control when there single output and single error signal for how well the output achieving the desired set point suppose however there are multiple control loops each with one output and one error signal but the loops are not fully particular when one loop increases its actuator signal this changes the impact the output from other loops the system for concrete example imagine voltage source series with resistor applying voltage across system six adjustable resistors parallel can measure the current through each resistor and want control the current each resistor adjusting the resistance course the trick here that when you adjust one resistor resistance changes the overall resistance the parallel set which means changes the voltage drop due the divider with the voltage source resistance and hence changes the current through the other resistors now clearly have ideal model for this system can predict what resistance should use for all resistors solving set linear equations however the whole point closed loop control that want correct for various unknown errors biases the system that deviate from our ideal model the question then what good way implement closed loop control when you have model with this kind cross coupling

attitude hold using and gyroscope and ultrasonic sensor for altitude hold since the scope indoor have done away with the barometer due its error resulting response without yaw control the plot below shows the response the quadrotor with yaw control the plot below shows the response the quadrotor debugging found out that each the outputs from each pid give too high value such that when summed together goes way over the pwm limit full throttle without yawpid the limiter kicks without damaging the desired response the system thus still able fly albeit with motion along the axis height with yawpid the added yaw components increases the sum the pid way above the limit thus the limiter compesates the excess too much resulting over all lower pwm output for all motors thus the quad never leaves the ground motor front left float motorpwm pitchpid rollpid yawpid motor front right float motorpwm pitchpid rollpid yawpid motor back left float motorpwm pitchpid rollpid yawpid motor back right float motorpwm pitchpid rollpid yawpid background the pid parameters for the pitch yaw and roll were tuned meaning the base throttle was set minimum value required for the quadcopter able lift itself the pid parameters for the altitude sensor tuned with the other active pitch and roll possible problem limiter algorithm possible problem that the algorithm used limit the maximum and the minimum throttle value may have caused the problem the following code used maintain the ratio the motor values instead limiting them the code used two stage limiter the stage one motorpwm less than the set the algorithm increases each motor pwm value until none them are below that the stage one motorpwm more than the set the algorithm decreases each motor pwm value until none them are above that this was obtained from pixhawk however the difference that they employ only upper bound limiting while mine also performs lower bound limiting which may cause more saturation once reaches the second stage from gains are set too high also possible that set gains too high thus exceeding the max rpm limit the motors causing the limiter algorithm current pid settings the minimum motor value for the quad lift itself while the maximum limit from the pwm time high pitch cascaded pid controller rate rate rate stabilize roll cascaded pid controller rate rate rate stabilize yaw cascaded pid controller rate rate rate stabilize hover single loop controller possible solution think have set the pid parameters the gain too high that the computed sum the outputs the controller beyond the limit maybe title: solving inverse kinematics with gradient descent
content: trying implement own inverse kinematics solver for robot arm solution standard iterative one where each step compute the jacobian and the pseudo inverse jacobian then compute the euclidean distance between the end effector and the target and from these then compute the next joint angles following the gradient with respect the end effector distance this achieves reasonable smooth path towards the solution however during reading have learned that typically there are fact multiple solutions when there are many degrees freedom but the gradient descent solution have only reaches one solution questions are follows how can compute all the solutions can write down the full forward kinematics equation set equal the desired end effector position and then solve the linear equations there better way there anything interest about the particular solution that achieved using gradient descent method for example guaranteed the solution that can reached the fastest the robot are there cases when the gradient descent method will fail for example possible that could fall into local minimum the function convex and hence has single global minimum

title: addressing the sample particle filter
content: have particle filter algorithm for the state estimation mobile robot there are several external range sensors the which gives the distance radius the robot based the time taken for the receiver the robot send back its using three more such will possible the position the robot the particle filter with particles and the sensor noise relatively low update phase each iteration range from external sensor received this assigns higher weights the particles along the radius the external sensor not all the particles are equally weighted since the process noise low hence most the cases the particle relatively closer the robot gets lower weight than incorrect one that happens along the radius the weight pdf resampling phase this stage the lower weighted particle the correct one that has negligible weight gets lost because the higher weighted particle gets picked all this happens the first iteration and when the range from another sensor arrives the robot already kidnapped googling around said that this problem called sample and the most common approach resample only when the particle variance low effective sample size number particles but when the particles are assigned negligible weights and there are relatively very few particles with higher weights the diversity the particles are lost resampling phase when the variance higher resampling done which removes the lower weighted particle and hence the diversity the particles lost isnt this completely the opposite the above idea ess sample correct there way this issue can fixed any pointers help would highly

title: quadrature encoder signal from motor very noisy
content: starting out with robotics got first gear motor with quadrature encoder ultimately plan hook motor driver connected tiva launchpad however since noob and curious starting just playing with with breadboard and voltage source when plug the motor power lines into variable voltage source the axis spins nicely expected between and the problems start when try check how the encoder works this first plug source into the encoder gnd vcc and then try monitor the encoder output while the motor running check the yellow encoder output cable the green encoder gnd cable made video that shows output from one the lines usb old took video using phone you would see the video the output doesn look anything like the beautiful square waves you typically see the instead extremely degraded noisy sin wave the correct frequency for the encoder the amplitude the sin not constant but changes over time strangely sometimes locks and looks like the ideal square wave for about second two but then gets all wonky again both the lines encoder and output act this way and they act this way the same time they will both lock and square the same time for those brief glorious moments clarity both motors are the same don think that have bad motor have also checked using vcc but made difference other than changing the amplitude the output note already posted this question reddit
